title: Execution of 26 corrupt Chinese politicians? No, 15-year-old photo of convicts being sentenced
subtitle: A photo
author: africacheck.org
vclaim:
on a Kenyan Facebook group page in May 2019 show police officers holding men in blue uniforms by their necks.

“Execution of 26 politicians in China due to corruption, what about Kenya?” the

While there have been

of Chinese officials being executed for corruption in the past, the photo

reveals that the photo was

by AFP 15 years ago, in 2004. It shows men convicted of “various crimes” at a “

“Chinese police show of a group of hardcore convicts at a sentencing rally in the east Chinese city of Wenzhou, 07 April 2004, where 11 prisoners were later executed for various crimes,” reads the

The photo also appears on

with the same caption.
